content: Mr. Burton,Thank you for contacting Capital Metro regarding your mobile app issue. Please accept our apology for any inconvenience this has caused. We have reported the issue to our vendor and are currently trying to find a resolution.Until it can be resolved, our operators and conductors have been notified, so customers should be able to board without anyone challenging them about their mobile app.If you have any questions or any other concerns, please respond here or contact our Go Line directly at 512-474-1200.Thank you,Sondra WilliamsContact Center SupervisorCapital Metro. Transportation Auth.512.474.1200customer.service@capmetro.org
